sentences.en: Bosses have a way of always finding out about such things.
sentences.cn: 老板总喜欢把这类事情搞清楚。

sentences.en: give way to traffic coming from the right.
sentences.cn: 给右边驶来的车辆让路。

sentences.en: he did whatever jobs came his way.
sentences.cn: 他碰上什么工作就干什么工作。

sentences.en: He reached the garden gate and thrust his way through it.
sentences.cn: 他来到花园门口，挤了进去。

sentences.en: He seemed fond of her in a strictly professional way.
sentences.cn: 他似乎只是出于职业缘故而喜欢她。

sentences.en: he was not a man to give way to this kind of pressure.
sentences.cn: 他不是一个屈服于这种压力的人。

sentences.en: He would have to accept it; there was no other way.
sentences.cn: 对此他将别无选择，只有接受。

sentences.en: His destination was Chobham Common, a long way from his Cotswold home.
sentences.cn: 他的目的地是乔伯姆公地，那里和他在科茨沃尔德的家离得很远。

sentences.en: I was just hoping things went my way.
sentences.cn: 我只是希望情况对我有利。

sentences.en: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business.
sentences.cn: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

sentences.en: It's a long way to go for two people in their seventies.
sentences.cn: 对于两个七十几岁的人来说，这段路太远了。

sentences.en: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.cn: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

sentences.en: Mrs Mott went out of her way to be courteous to Sara.
sentences.cn: 莫特夫人特地对莎拉表示礼貌。

sentences.en: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.cn: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.en: oh, by the way, while you were away I had a message.
sentences.cn: 哦，顺便提一句，你不在的时候我收到了一条消息。

sentences.en: one by one the staff went their way.
sentences.cn: 职员们一个接一个地离开了。

sentences.en: She was afraid in a way that was quite new to her.
sentences.cn: 她感到从未有过的害怕。

sentences.en: Sometimes things don't turn out the way we think they're going to.
sentences.cn: 有时事情并不像我们认为的那样发展。

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: The barb stung her exactly the way he hoped it would.
sentences.cn: 如他所愿，这句带刺的话刺痛了她。

sentences.en: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.cn: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.en: The pull-out of the army paves the way for independence.
sentences.cn: 军队的撤出为独立铺平了道路。

sentences.en: There are several different ways we can tackle this problem.
sentences.cn: 我们可以用几种不同的方法处理这个问题。

sentences.en: There are several ways through the woods.
sentences.cn: 有好几条路可以穿过树林。

sentences.en: There’s no way of knowing if the treatment will work.
sentences.cn: 没有办法知道这种治疗方法是否有效。

sentences.en: They could interpret it that way if they'd a mind to.
sentences.cn: 如果他们愿意的话，可以那样理解。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: wait for Owen, he's going your way.
sentences.cn: 等一下欧文，他跟你同路。

sentences.en: We are taught to construe these terms in a particular way.
sentences.cn: 我们被教导要以特定的方式理解这些词语。

sentences.en: you will have a fine view of Moray Firth by the way.
sentences.cn: 在途中你将欣赏到马里湾的美丽景色。

phrases.tran_cn: 发生于某人身上，被某人碰到
（尤指不听不同建议）独自行动
在某种程度上；有点儿；[口]十分激动
单向的；单程的；单方面的
同样；同样的方法；同样的感受

trans.tran_cn: 方法，形式，方面，习俗，作风，路径，方向，距离

trans.tran_en: a method that you use to do or achieve something
